MonsterTrait.Name: False Appearance
MonsterTrait.Text: While Lifferlas remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

MonsterTrait.Name: Roleplaying Information
MonsterTrait.Text:
A druid of the Emerald Enclave awakened the tree Lifferlas with a spell. Goldenfields is his home, its people his friends. Children like to carve their name and initials into his body and hang from his boughs, and he's happy with that.
Ideal: "I exist to protect the people and plants of Goldenfields." Bond: "Children are wonderful. I would do anything to make them feel happy and safe." Flaw: "I can't remember people's names and often get them mixed up."

MonsterAction.Name: Slam
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6+4) bludgeoning damage.
